title: The Monkees Live Summer Tour
creator_credit: Win Media Corp and David Fishof
brief_description: Thirty years after the peak of their fame, “The Monkees” reformed for a North American tour. This disc contains a live performance of that tour. Micky Dolenz, Davy Jones, and Peter Tork are the members from the original line-up that perform on this show. Songs included are: “Last train to Clarksville”, “Look out (here comes tomorrow)”, “For Pete’s sake”, “The Girl I knew somewhere”, “Valleri”, “Randy scouse git”, “Mary Mary”, “Goin’ down”, “Can you dig it?”, “Girl”, “Higher and higher”, “A little bit me, a little bit you”, “She hangs out”, “That was then, this is now”, “Daydream believer”, “I’m a believer”, “(I’m not your) Stepping stone”, “Pleasant Valley Sunday”.
